data.text: Dawuda mɔn yi Isirayila sofa sɛnbɛmane birin malan, muxu wuli tonge saxan.

Na ganla yi biraxi a fɔxɔ ra, a siga Baala taani Yuda yi, alogo a xa sa Alaa Kankiraan6.2 Alaa Layiri Kankirana fe mɔn sɛbɛxi Xɔrɔyaan 25.10-22 kui. tongo, Ala xinla nan na kankiraan ma, Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna, naxan dɔxi maleka gubugubu kan sawurane tagi.
E yi Alaa Kankiraan sa wontoro nɛnɛn kui keli Abinadabo a banxini geyaan fari. Wusa nun Axiyo, Abinadabo a dii xɛmɛne nan yi wontoro nɛnɛn nagima.
E yi a tongo Abinadabo a banxini geyaan fari, Axiyo yi sigama a yɛɛ ra.
Dawuda nun Isirayila yamaan birin yi sɛwan mayitama Alatala ra, e maxaseen sifan birin maxama, alo bɔlɔnna nun kondenna nun tanbanna nun kariɲanna nun maxase gbɛtɛye.
E to Nakon ma lonna li, Wusa yi a yiini bandun, a Alaa Kankiraan suxu, bayo ɲingene bata yi salaxun.
Nayi, Alatala yi xɔlɔ a ma han! A yi a faxa na xaxilitareya wanla fe ra. Wusa yi faxa mɛnni, Alaa Kankiraan fɛma.
Alatala to Wusa niin ba, a faxa. Nayi, Dawuda yi xɔlɔ han, e yi mɛn xili sa “Wusa halagidena” han to.
Na lɔxɔni, Dawuda yi gaxu Alatala yɛɛ ra, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Alatalaa Kankiraan soma di n konni?”
Nayi, a yi tondi Alatalaa Kankiraan xalɛ a konni, Dawudaa Taani. A yi a xali Obedi-Edɔn Gati kaana banxini.
Alatalaa Kankiraan yi lu Obedi-Edɔn Gati kaana banxini kike saxan, Alatala yi barakan sa Obedi-Edɔn nun a denbayaan birin ma fe yi.

E sa na fala Manga Dawuda xa a Alatala bata barakan sa Obedi-Edɔn ma denbayaan birin ma fe yi e nun a gbeen seen naxanye birin na masɔtɔ Alaa Kankirana fe ra. Nayi, Dawuda yi Alaa Kankiraan tongo Obedi-Edɔn yi, a siga a ra Dawudaa Taani sɛwani.
Alatalaa Kankiraan xali muxune na yi e sanna yɛ sennin tongo, Dawuda yi ɲinge keden nun ɲinge dii raturaxi keden nan bama saraxan na.
Dawuda yi a bodon a sɛnbɛn birin na Alatala yɛtagi, a yi maxidixi saraxarali domaan nan gbansan yi.
Dawuda nun Isirayila yamaan birin yi fa Alatalaa Kankiraan na Yerusalɛn yi, ɲaxaɲaxan nun xɔta xuine yi.

Alatalaa Kankiraan yi soma Dawudaa Taani waxatin naxan yi, Sɔli a dii tɛmɛn Mikali yi a matoma banxin foye soden na, a yi Manga Dawuda to tuganɲɛ ayi, a bodonma Alatalaa Layiri Kankiraan yɛtagi. Na ma, Mikali yi Dawuda raɲaxu a bɔɲɛni.
Na xanbi ra, e fa Alatalaa Kankiraan na, e yi a dɔxɔ bubuni, Dawuda naxan yɛlan a xili yi, Dawuda yi saraxa gan daxine nun bɔɲɛ xunbeli saraxane ba Alatala xa.
Dawuda yelin saraxa gan daxine nun bɔɲɛ xunbeli saraxane bɛ waxatin naxan yi, a yi duba Isirayila yamaan xa Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna xinli.

A mɔn yi donseene yitaxun Isirayila yamaan birin na, xɛmɛn nun ɲaxanla, birin yi burun sɔtɔ e nun tamaro bogi xare rafalaxin nun ɲaxun danna rafalaxin xundi keden keden. Na xanbi ra, birin yi siga a konni.

Dawuda yi xɛtɛ a duba a denbayaan xa, Sɔli a dii tɛmɛn Mikali yi mɛnni a ralandeni. A yi a fala, a naxa, “Binyen mundun yi a ra to Isirayila mangan to yi a yɛtɛ yitama a walikɛ ɲaxanle nun a walikɛ xɛmɛne ra, alo fuyantenna a ligɛ kii naxan yi.”
Dawuda yi Mikali yabi, a naxa, “N na a ligaxi Alatala nan yɛtagi naxan n sugandixi i baba nun a denbayaan birin xa, a n findi Isirayila kuntigin na, a yamana, n nan n ma sɛwan yitaxi na nan na.
N wama nɛn n xa raɲaxu dangu na ra, n yi n yɛtɛ magodo n yɛtɛ yɛtagi. Koni, walikɛ ɲaxanle n binyama nɛn i naxanye fe falaxi.”
Sɔli a dii tɛmɛn Mikali mi dii sɔtɔ han a faxa.
